testcase.name: Then the Sport section should have a "Show more" cta that loads in more top stories
Then the Comment is free section should have a "Show more" cta that loads in more top stories
Then the Culture section should have a "Show more" cta that loads in more top stories
When I hide a section then the section will be hidden
When I show a section then the section will be shown
When I refresh the page then the section will remain hidden
